remarks: Corollary of the Projection Theorem:  A topologically closed subspace is algebraically closed in Hilbert space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cldcss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cldcss.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
cldcss.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
cldcss.c $e |- C = ( CSubSp ` W ) $.
cldcss $p |- ( W e. CHil -> ( U e. C <-> ( U e. L /\ U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) ) $.
